articles.author: Shubhajit Roy
articles.title: Delhi asks European Union nations to consider India vaccines for travel to Europe - The Indian Express
articles.description: Delhi News: The EU's resistance in accepting India-made vaccines for its 'vaccination passport' has also prompted New Delhi to come up with a policy.
articles.content: With the European Union (EU) forming a EU Digital Covid Certificate framework to facilitate free movement from July 1, India has asked EU member-states to accept Covid-19 vaccines authorised by the W… [+3189 chars]

articles.title: Sausage wars: EU and UK agree to extension of chilled meats grace period - thejournal.ie

articles.title: Accept Covishield, Covaxin Or Face Mandatory Quarantine, India Tells EU - NDTV
articles.description: The European Union's tardiness in accepting the Indian-made vaccines has triggered a face-off. Sources in the foreign ministry said India will institute a reciprocal policy on recognition of vaccination certificates.
articles.content:
Unless EU accepts Indian vaccine certificates, theirs will not be accepted in the country either (File)
Highlights
<ul><li>EU nations accept only vaccines approved by the European Medicines Agency… [+2233 chars]
